@StephanLecteur Cependant veuillez noter aussi que Pour les liquides, gels, crèmes et lotions, les restrictions suivantes s'appliquent :
Les liquides doivent se trouver dans un contenant de 100 ml ou 100 g au maximum.
Cordialement, 
Leon Placide

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @jackiecollings1 In this context, we regret that we are unable to expedite or prioritize your case or to give you more precise information regarding the delivery of your goods. However, you can keep checking the latest tracking status online: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH.
